page.title: 16EDUCATION
page.content: On 1st September 1979 Sandbach High School opened in the building formerly occupied by Sandbach County Secondary School.The new school is a comprehensive for girls aged 11 to 18. At present there are approximately 900 pupils and 49 staff. During the first three years all girls study the following subjects: English,Mathematics,Science,History, Geography,Religious Education,French, Art and Design,Home Studies and Crafts,Music and Physical Education. Other special subjects are introduced in the 4th and 5th years e.g.Commerce,Computer Studies,German, Social Studies and Typing. The General Certificate of Education at 'O' Level and Certificate of Secondary Education are sat in the 5th year and GCE 'A' Level at the end of the Sixth Form Course.
